Author: Ughleigh
Text: Makes a huge difference for me. I look like a fat bloated fuck anytime I go overboard on carbs and have endless farts. I usually try to eat none and that's when I feel the best physically and mentally.

Author: thefakemexoxo
Text: This happens to me. I feel like everywhere I touch on my body feels weirdly spongey after a lot of carbs and sodium.
